Articles.Content:
I have a few mods installed in my game, and after I tried installing the Alcubierre and RandomizedSystems, the game crashed at launch. Even when I uninstalled them, it still crashes.

Here's the link to my log: http://www./view/p762mdagmydr3p6/output_log.txt

Edited November 25, 2014 by _Augustus_
We're probably going to need to see the whole log file. Please upload it to http://www.pastebin.com/ (in multiple pieces if it's too long for a single upload) and post the link(s) here.

We're probably going to need to see the whole log file. Please upload it to http://www.pastebin.com/ (in multiple pieces if it's too long for a single upload) and post the link(s) here.

I added a mediafire link.

You're running out of memory:

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationCould not allocate memory: System out of memory!

You'll need to use Active Texture Management (probably the not-basic version) or remove some texture-heavy mods, like KSPRC or Near Future.

You'll need to use Active Texture Management (probably the not-basic version) or remove some texture-heavy mods, like KSPRC or Near Future.
